info.title: Pearson API
info.description: Application with multiple services, including a web scraper, database, and gateway/endpoints for queries. Provides data about flights departing from and arriving to Toronto Pearson International Airport.

application/json.example:
[
    {
        flightCode: "F81225",
        flightDate: "2022-07-26",
        city: "Vancouver",
        airportCode: "YVR",
        airlineName: "Flair Airlines",
        airlineCode: "F8",
        scheduledTime: "00:05",
        revisedTime: "01:45"
        flightStatus: Arrived
    }
]

400.description: Bad Request.  `JSON` object returned indicates which query fields are malformed.

application/json.example:
submit: 'Error: Bad Request',
errorFields: 'flightCode, startDate, endDate'

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: Start date to query from in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. If `startDate` is present, `endDate` must be included as well. For one date, set `startDate` and `endDate` equal to the same value. Otherwise, `startDate` must be before `endDate`

endDate.name: startDate
endDate.description: End date to query from in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. If `end` is present, `startDate` must be included as well. For one date, set `startDate` and `endDate` equal to the same value. Otherwise, `endDate` must be after `startDate`

city.name: City
city.description:
A string or array of strings denoting cities where flights have departed or arrived from.

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.

airlineName.name: Airline Name
airlineName.description:
String or array of strings denoting airline name.

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.

flightCode.name: Flight Code
flightCode.description:
Flight code of the flight required. Can be a string or an array of strings. For example, `AC756`or `[AC756, AC757]`. 

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.

airlineCode.name: Airport Code
airlineCode.description:
`IATA` airport code, either two letters or a letter and a number. Can be a string or array of strings.

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.

airportCode.name: Airport Code
airportCode.description:
`IATA` airport code, three letters. Can be a string or array of strings.

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.

scheduledTime.name: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: Twenty four hour `HH:MM`time flight(s) were initially scheduled for. Can be individual or an array of times.

revisedTime.name: Scheduled Time
revisedTime.description: Twenty four hour `HH:MM`revised time for flight(s). Can be individual or an array of times.

flightStatus.name: Flight Status
flightStatus.description:
The status for flights queried. Can be a string value or an array of strings from the following schema depending on whether querying for departures or arrivals.

String should not be wrapped in quotes and arrays should not have spaces between values.
